name: Don't Stop (itch) (Markedagain)
description:
Controls:

Move: WASD

Aim:Mouse

Shoot:Hold Left Mouse

(2-4Min to finish game)

Description:

Your oldest power up will slowly go away over time and when a zombie touches you, when u have no power ups left you die.

4 different power ups from more guns, faster fire rate, more damage and long distance. 

Made for WGJ Week 160 (Nothing Says Forever)

So many more ideas, so little time. Hope you enjoy.

Sprites Assets used (pick these up in last months humble bundle:

VexedEnigma/PixelJustice (HorrorCity Tile Pack)
